plot: In The Diamond Light's new music video "HITMAN" a cold and calculated young woman named Sai seeks revenge for her abusive past while simultaneously working as a contract killer.
title: The Diamond Light: Hitman
plot_es: In The Diamond Light's new music video "HITMAN" a cold and calculated young woman named Sai seeks revenge for her abusive past while simultaneously working as a contract killer.
plot_en: In The Diamond Light's new music video "HITMAN" a cold and calculated young woman named Sai seeks revenge for her abusive past while simultaneously working as a contract killer.
